author: Staff Reporter
text:
Twenty-three-year-old Jothi, wife of knitwear company employee Parthasarathy, was found hanging at her residence in Chamundypuram in Tirupur.

According to the 15 Velampalayam Police, after an altercation Parthasarathy had left home with their one-year-old child and returned home after an hour or so on Tuesday night to find his wife hanging.

Neighbours alerted

He immediately alerted the neighbours who in-turn informed them, said the police. The two were married over a year ago.

The local police have registered a case of suspicious death.
title: Woman found dead at her house in Tirupur
